title: TenureChangeTransactionMetadata
description: Describes representation of a Type 7 Stacks transaction: Tenure Change

tenure_consensus_hash.description: Consensus hash of this tenure. Corresponds to the sortition in which the miner of this block was chosen.

prev_tenure_consensus_hash.description: Consensus hash of the previous tenure. Corresponds to the sortition of the previous winning block-commit.

burn_view_consensus_hash.description: Current consensus hash on the underlying burnchain. Corresponds to the last-seen sortition.

previous_tenure_blocks.description: The number of blocks produced in the previous tenure.

cause.description: Cause of change in mining tenure. Depending on cause, tenure can be ended or extended.

pubkey_hash.description: (Hex string) The ECDSA public key hash of the current tenure.

signature.description: (Hex string) A Schnorr signature from the Stackers.

signers.description: (Hex string) A bitmap of which Stackers signed.
